name: Those Nights at Randy's 3 (2020)
description:
~THOSE NIGHTS AT RANDY'S 3~

Based after the events of Randy's Pizza World which happened years ago a family moves to sunshine for hopes of a bright future. The family has recently welcomed a new born baby girl into the world and have moved into their new home. However they have visitors... They shortly became victims of the Childs play curse. Once a family or person is affected by the curse they are bound to die shortly after the events. The creatures from the curse take form of the Randy's Children's Café entertainers.

~NEW GAMEPLAY CHANGES~

During the game you play as each family member and each family member has their own system. The emerge mechanic is the newest system available which takes a bit more storage than previous games. The flashlight feature is a bit off and make sure your mouse cursor is what you're using to flash.

~SPECIAL NIGHTS~

The special nights is a new feature which incudes 2 more nights which are optional. Finishing these nights will reward players giving them progress towards their scrapbook.

~EMERGE CHEATS~

The new mechanic includes cheats which can be toggled in the options menu. Activating the cheats will display a mini-map in game showing players the location of entertainers. Once cheats have been enabled the player will not unlock scrapbook achievements, ending cutscene, extras menu & progress. Special nights does not support cheats.

~SCRAPBOOK~

This scrapbook feature was a cut thing from Those Nights AT Randy's 2 due to running out of time. However the feature was bought into Those Nights AT Randy's 3 as a achievement tracker. Scrapbook photos can be unlocked by doing the required task for their assigned night.
